website_summaries.verdict: A unique design for maximum flavor and a stylish look that's great for gifting.
pros: This BPA-free bottle includes a flip-top lid and an insulated sleeve
The infuser gets inserted into the bottom of the bottle, which means there's better flavor distribution throughout the water
cons: A bit smaller than other brands (24 ounces)
Some had trouble with the rubber ring at the bottom, causing leaks

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where the positive reviews are coming from! I’ve had this bottle one day and it leaks everywhere!!!! All the pieces are assembled correctly with no errors waste of my money! *EDIT* i was contacted by the seller who sent me a new bottle the next day. So far so good I appreciate the great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Scheler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Received my rose gold water infuser today. Love the quality of the packing and product. However when I inspected the basket that holds the fruit it looked like it had dirt on it. I posted my review and submitted to exchange the product and was immediately contacted by MAWI WATA and my issue was resolved quickly. Highly recommend. Love the product. Love the service. Bravo!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Useless without the touch of a button
customer_reviews.text: Until yesterday I absolutely Loved this bottle. My son Got it from my amazon wish list as a Christmas gift, it lasted me a total of 56 days. I used it about 3 times a week so it was used maybe 24 times. Yesterday, using it as usual I pushed the button to open it and the button sprung right off. The problem with this is the bottle is completely useless without that button, the lid won’t close and water would spill out. I’m So disappointed, I searched through so many of these to find what I thought would be the perfect fruit infused bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Leaks but pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really awesome idea, but is constantly leaking no matter how tight I secure the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Madison Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Leak & it’s Pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this water bottle for about two or three weeks and I haven’t had any problems yet. I get a lot of compliments on my water bottle and love how the water bottle makes my apples and lemon more attractive to drink lol!! The only problem I had was the fruit infused basket. ITS SO SMALL. Since there’s a catcher at the top, the apple or lemon won’t go fall directly into your mouth. I don’t mind cutting it up bigger which saves me more time than cutting it into smaller pieces. The lock on the water bottle holds well and I’ve dropped it a couple of times and no scratches. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product, aesthetic, functional, and GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: SHOUT OUT TO JOSEPH FROM CUSTOMER SERVICE ON FACEBOOK - their customer service is AMAZING. I had thrown away the small leak proof portion of the mouth, which is why the bottle kept leaking from the top. I messaged the Company on Facebook and Joseph got back to me IMMEDIATELY and sent me a new bottle (I had asked for a replacement stopper for the mouth area). I love my rose gold bottle - it doesn't leak from either the top or bottom and Mami Wata has amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but broke
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is so beautiful! It worked perfect for the first few months I had it, but sadly the lock feature broke:( The spring popped right out and broke the plastic!(I took great care of it, never dropped it) Only thing I can think is I used it every day, so opening it and closing it over and over made the plastic loose it’s durability. For the price I was hoping it would last me at least a year. If you only plan on using it once or twice a week it should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: savvy

customer_reviews.title: My girls approve
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 10 year old because a ‘freebie’ infuser cup she had got thrown away She loves this and her 12 year old sister is jealous! Easy to clean (which is why the other was thrown away) Very nice looking bottle Beautifully packaged Feels durable The rose gold is very fashionable Love that it comes with extra seals for the lid, that’s the sort of thing that you get with higher priced luxury items So far we’re fans
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Hinchliffe

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was displeased because my very fancy plastic bottle with the fruit infuser leaked. One of the owners responded to my comment via email, apologized, refunded me and sent me another bottle to try! It was wonderful. It did leak once, but that was after a week or two after I got it and that may have been my fault. I haven’t used it much, but only because by the time I received the new one, I didn’t need it much anymore. It’s very pretty, a great idea and you should definitely try it, if it’s something you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joye Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good for the once in a while use, not everyday
customer_reviews.text: At first it’s really nice, mine came with black stuff on it. After using for a week the lingering odor of cucumbers or whatnot stays. Turns out it’s the seal at the bottom that attracts mold. So keep that scrubbed every time should be fine. The plastic fruit holder is tiny & flimsy almost cracked mine putting frozen pineapple to barely fit. Bottle Leaks at the base after sitting maybe 2 hours at my work desk if not touched. Not sure if mines just defective. Really pretty bottle though, get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: BMAD

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very cheap and twice the price as a nice water bottle from Meijer. It's all plastic, started to grow mold no matter how often I'd clean it (I even had special small scrub brushes to get in all the small spaces. I tried the dishwasher, even though it's not dishwasher safe, as a last resort-- Nothing happened to the bottle and the mold remained in the small areas. The bottom portion would leak as well if you didn't get it screwed on just right. This bottle was great for MAYBE a month and then too late to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't dislike anything about it. I put watermelon or strawberries in it. I would suggest cutting the strawberries into smaller pieces for the sake of flavor. It's beautifully packaged so you could give it as a gift. I bought one for a friend of mine in rose gold, and she loves it. I bought the red. I may go back and buy the green and purple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fruit Infuser Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this water bottle for my daughter. The one she had previously was accidentally broken. She has had it for a few days and tells me she loves it more than her previously one, especially the pretty peach color. She says it works well and is easy to carry. Overall, she is very satisfied with the product and would recommend it to her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to use this water bottle today. That’s because I went grocery shopping to get all my fruits and herbs to do a particular recipe for the water. I love this water bottle. It’s not only cute 💓 but it’s very easy to clean. It’s has a lock on the top to prevent any spillages. The tube inside is removable so you can have more room to add larger pieces of fruit. I recommend you use blueberries, blackberries, and raspberries (or any other smaller size fruit) for the smaller tube in the center. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Da Brat

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Jun 3rd Used 3-4 nights a week for two months The button to pop the lid open broke on one side recently, so I contacted the company. They immediately sent me a new one. My wife loves this water bottle infuser and Dan with customer service is a good representative. Easy to clean Can pack more fruit than you think in the infuser section The double lock never accidentally opened and spilled Only leaked was when I didn't fully or correctly screw on either top or bottom piece
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s a super cute bottle and the infuser net works great. It definitely isn’t the best quality it broke right after the first month mark while it was in my padded backpack but customer service was great! They sent me a new one within the week and my new one has held up nicely so far. Sometimes you have to mess with it a little after you fill it up to ensure there’s no leaks though. Like I said not the end quality but the price isn’t bad so overall worth it, just handle with care
customer_reviews.author: megan braida

customer_reviews.title: functional & fun
customer_reviews.text: This infuser water bottle looks good & works great. I love the extra features like the koozie that comes with it. Love trying out the different recipes for different flavors. The only thing I would change is the top is a bit complicated with the lock & a button to open the top. I would like that simplified a bit. But overall great water bottle!
customer_reviews.author: D. Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Looks exactly as pictured. Super cute. I've found it very easy to take apart and put back together. Love the lock function. Love the sleeve it comes with. My only complaint is it doesn't have measurements on the bottle like others do, but that's not a big deal to me. Overall, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Super cute infuser; easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So this came fairly quickly. It was pretty easy to figure out how to use. The instructions were very clear. It looks really posh and streamlined. I've had it two days so can't speak as to the durability but I like it a lot. My only complaint is the water doesn't stay cold very long. I have a dislike for room temperature water and was hoping this would keep a bit. All in all, pleased with my birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: madame.wesker

customer_reviews.title: Just MEH
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this more than I do, but it falls well short of my expectations. It's okay at best. It leaks a little bit, it's not real easy to clean and is not something that is all that portable. Its okay if I am just posted up around the house or at my desk at the office, but I could never take this to the gym or on a jog or even a walk.
customer_reviews.author: david forsberg

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenage daughter. She loves it. She takes it to school every day. She loves the color and the lock feature. I love that it came with extra rubber seals (just in case we need them in the future) and a cute insulated sleeve to put over the cup to keep things cooler longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren FitMom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love! I was looking for something similar to add some lemon and mint to my water. Originally the product had a problem and I almost didn’t keep it. Fortunately I contact the seller and told him- he fix the issue immediately!!!! I’m very happy from the service I got as well as the bottle itself. That’s how people should treat their customers! Glad I kept that and now using it regularly
customer_reviews.author: Ofer Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this bottle and is INLOVE makes me want to purchase one it’s worth every penny you won’t regret it and the gift box that it comes in is very solid you can refuse that and the colors in the picture match in person forgot to mention put ice in and then water even if it’s not cold it will make it super cold real fast so use your sleeve
customer_reviews.author: Fluff

customer_reviews.title: Elegant water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful water bottle and seems well made. I bought it for a friend to encourage her to drink more water. She loves it and uses it often cause “it’s pretty”. She says it hasn’t leaked. I bought hers for 19.99. Came back to buy more for myself and more for gifts, but the price raised. I refuse on principle to pay more 2 weeks after bought for cheaper. If I can catch it back at 19.99, I’ll buy this bottle again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t have asked for a better product .  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great it arrived early. Only had trouble with my delivery. it was delivered two doors down, I had to chase it down but that was no fault to Amazon or the seller. Absolutely will purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Patlynn

customer_reviews.title: It was good.....until it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: The clamp broke after 2 months of use. Trust me I’m not a rough person. I loved this bottle when I first got it and I used it every day. The plastic is not that great because it definitely keeps the smell of the fruit even after I deep cleaned it with a bottle brush. But it was good enough to use everyday......until it broke. I’m sad. I wanted to live it.
customer_reviews.author: Julene

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof easy to clean great taste holds a lot of water.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! I use it every day! So easy to clean I don’t even care it’s not dishwasher safe. It all comes apart for easy clean No spill And locks so toddler don’t steal it haha. I love all the flavors I can make with fruit it’s so refreshing. It’s a must have for sure.
customer_reviews.author: daniel geddes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It came in the mail really quick and honestly I was a bit nervous because it was a great deal for the price . But it looks and comes exactly like the picture. Definitely worth the buy and it’s easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: veronica lynn kates

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this bottle and the company/customer service. My first bottle came damaged but I didn’t realize it until i was unable to return it. They contacted me, shipped me a new bottle at no cost, and did 2 day shipping as wel. Super impressed and I LOVE the bottle. Super cute and so functional
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's not a Glass Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Don't make the same mistake that I did. I searched for a 24oz GLASS WATER BOTTLE. When I saw this pop up I thought it looked amazing and stylish. I guess I didn't read the fine print. I am not impressed at all. I will not return this as I am not one to go through the trouble. But I will gift it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased! It is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have Parkinson's, I was concern about the ease of use, but it's comes apart to clean very easily. I love the little strap, I put it on my wrist so I don't drop it. The cover also saves it from bumping when I shake a lot. The buttons make it easier to open. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma B

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my fruit infuser. I bought one for my friend and one for myself. The packaging is beautiful and I recommend to anyone who has difficulty drinking their daily required water intake, drink from this bottle water container. It encourages water intake solely on the beaudtuful design and the fruit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: So close to perfect I gave it a 5 star; love having the fruit on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: ONLY COMPLAINTS - 1) the buttons on the lid that unlock it feel like cheap plastic compared to the rest of the bottle and 2) you have to use two hands to flip the cap up. That being said: I LOVE THIS WATER BOTTLE. I got it to trick myself into drinking more water. It's working. Whatever fruit we have around the house, I chop it up and throw it in. Love the basket to hold fruit is attached to the bottom. Overall, seems very high quality. Nothing leaks. Came with two extra rubber rings.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Piasecki

customer_reviews.title: Check the bottle as soon as you receive it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty awesome bottle, if you get the good one I guess 🤷🏽‍♀️ Mine is leaking through the opening as there is no seal. I sent an email to supplier and got no answer what so ever. The only reason for 2 stars is for the original design and idea... disappointed with customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: Valery Green

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend...and I want one now! The packaging alone makes it seems as if it costs more than it did! Beautiful box, then inside the bottle is protected with a sleeve and wrapping. It comes with extra seals for the cap. It's a gorgeous color. The recipe for infused water is emailed as a PDF. So fancy looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! It’s so convenient to have and fits in all of my cup holders in car and in baby stroller. Very easy to use and clean. Love it and would highly recommend it. It is also much better then other water infusers because you can actually put ice in there without having to struggle and mess around with getting top on or having leaking problems. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Martino

customer_reviews.title: Less Functional Over Time
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the sleek look of this waterbottle and I really wanted on that had the pop top on it. I've had mine for a little over 6 months and the pop top barely works. I have to constantly mess with it to get the lid to open. The lettering has also partially rubbed off making it look even more worn than it should. I love the sleeve and the size of the water bottle and appreciate that it's taller rather than wide, but I think I'll be looking for a more durable bottle and might just give up on the idea of a pop-top water bottle going forward.
customer_reviews.author: T-T-T-TOM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, but the packaging and the quality of the bottle is so great, I'm going to purchase one for myself. The customer service appears to be fantastic as well. I love the color of the bottle and that the basket for the fruit attaches to the bottom of the bottle. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Water Bottle Leaks from bottom
customer_reviews.text: Upon first use of the water bottle, I filled with fruit and water and set down it down on the table. When I came back, there was a fairly large puddle on the table and it was clear the bottle was leaking from the bottom where the cap screws on. I refilled the bottle and tightened the cap as tight as it would go, yet water was still visibly dripping out of the sides. I am returning this bottle and finding one from a different company that is not so cheaply made and will actually hold water, like a water bottle is supposed to do. This is such a disappointment as this was a beautiful bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Mami Wata fruit Infuser water bottles make great gifts.
customer_reviews.text: I brought the Mami Wata Fruit Infuser water bottles as gifts for some co-workers, male and females and they loved it. My co-workers are watching their weight and I thought this would be a great gift for them. At the end of the day they were talking about what fruits can use. I never had a fruit Infuser water bottle, but after seeing how awesome Mami Wata fruit Infuser water bottle looked, I will consider getting myself one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Latch broke
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this In January, and my latch to open it has already broken off. Now my lid won’t stay shut and locked. Currently having to use a rubber band to keep lid shut. Do you have replacement lids??? Update: EMAIL was received that they do not offer replacement parts but willing to give me a coupon for 50% off a new bottle. Wait, what? I owned this bottle for a month and it breaks easily and you aren’t going to even attempt to replace it? Or even the lid...not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I had trouble with it leaking the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I had trouble with it leaking the first day - the rubber washer wasn't set properly as I thought. The color is more peach than pink that I thought it was. That was disappointing. But this is by far the most beautiful water bottle I have ever had and so far is very durable
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is beautiful and exactly what I wanted. I used it 3 times and it was perfect!!! Unfortunately, now it leaks. Every-time I add water to it the water drips out the bottom and I can't use it anymore. I thought this was going to be my go to gift for friends as it really is pretty, and a great way to infuse water with fruit but it needs to be improved in order to prevent leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shein

customer_reviews.title: Open feature breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this mamiwata bottle. The first time the open button just broke off when I opened it to take a sip. I thought it was just a fluke so I decided to purchase another one figuring it wouldn't happen again. Well a few months later, the same thing happened and the open button broke making it impossible to close the water bottle (same as the first time). I love the stylish aspect, size and the colors available but I am very disappointed in the durability of this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: So it came in a pretty package and looked so nice but after just a few uses it looks foggy and scratched up. I only put water in it and only washed it twice and it looks old and faded. I would expect better quality for the price. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: misty mccrary

customer_reviews.title: Almost took hers
customer_reviews.text: My bestfriend loves it. I got this for her birthday, it comes apart all together. Really easy to clean! Additional: I bought another for myself but in green. I love it. Everything is the same just a different color
customer_reviews.author: ThatOneGirl

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the mechanism to open and close broke second time we used so NOT HAPPY! Leaks, etc. it was too late to request return as I bought for a gift. Quite embarrassing!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: This review is a little overdue, but I really liked this water bottle. It's super cute and I got a lot of compliment on it. Unfortunately, it did not even last me one month. The tab mechanism used to pop the top open broke off with normal use. Now the cap is open permanently and I am unable to use it or fix it. I am super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It's a Christmas gift but I looked at it and very pleased. I appreciate the followup email with the menu book which I printed and will include with the gift. In fact I need to order 1 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve had so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It does leak just a little if laying on its side for too long. If you keep it up right you shouldn’t have any problems. It comes with a sleeve, which I put on it and throw in my backpack. I haven’t had a spillage problem. Very durable, easy to clean and use, I would definitely recommend this water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter but did not use until now, filled with water and fruit, she was excited but the excitement was very short lived. It leaked! the rubber seal at the top is very loose and not sealing well. I know its been almost a year, but was in original box, not opened. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Joseph He

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again for myself/gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I swear I’m drinking more water now because of this! I always carried around a bigger water bottle but this one is tall and slim so it fits everywhere perfect - my car, backpack, travel. Plus, it’s the most beatiful bottle!! I use it with or without fruit. Chopped Strawberries are my favorite to add in my water.
customer_reviews.author: Aly626

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is beautiful and sooo well packaged. Get ready to tell all of your friends/coworkers where you got it from because they WILL ask. Bought one in rose gold and another for my mom in red. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TFran

customer_reviews.title: A mess
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once and it was a pain. It leaks and is difficult to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: JU

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Super gorgeous but...it leaks from the bottom! I've tried several times to reattach the bottom so that the threads line up but it continues to leak. Sad. Must use with a towel and drink quickly
customer_reviews.author: LILLIAN Y. MORALES

customer_reviews.title: Love it! :)
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I’ve gotten so many compliments on it at work and it doesn’t leak! I was a little nervous because of some of the other reviews! I can fit one one whole water bottle, 16.9 ounces and almost a whole lemon sliced up into the bottle so I was pretty pleased! :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssia

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Overall really happy with this bottle. Love the infuser feature. I had a minor issue and they were very helpful and quick in responding so I’m happy with both the product and the customer service! I do recommend you screw on the base super tight to prevent any drips!
customer_reviews.author: JGold

customer_reviews.title: Leaked within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design and pretty packaging but it already leaked after 10 uses. Hand washed and still didn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.author: jmptwp1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Customer Service. Great versatile and durable bottle that does not leak. Their team went above and beyond to make sure I received my bottle. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: nzingaimani

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I get to drink my lemon water everyday and not choke on seeds. Love the components of this bottle. Very easy to clean. Love love love the rose gold color. Best purchase for an infuser bottle. I've tried others and they don't compare. This one is super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brodnex

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuse flavor and no leakage
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt hold a lot of water but I love how it defuses throughout the entire bottle instead of just at the bottom like my previous bottle. I can taste the difference instantly. Color is beautiful and the lid is easy to secure and open. No leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Laura lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite water bottle. I picked the rose gold one and its perfect! Every piece comes apart for cleaning but goes together easily and securely. Holds quit a bit in the infuser tube. Also, just plain adorable. Thinking of ordering more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! It’s so pretty and it comes with a coozy for the outside so it keeps your water cooler a littler longer and catches any condensation. I also love that the fruit infuser chamber loads at the bottom, so you put that in first then it’s easier to fill if you want to put ice in with your water. Also comes with a great little e-book of infused water recipes
customer_reviews.author: LBnurse

customer_reviews.title: It Lived up To It’s Name
customer_reviews.text: I Don’t Dislike A THINK ! It lives up to its Name It’s BEAUTIFUL AND MOST IMPORTANT IT DOSENT LEAK!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great! Not a fan of the fact that it’s not dishwasher safe, but I love this water bottle! It can surprisingly fit a lot of fruit and helps me get my water goal in!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Keep track of the white rubber piece inside the top.
customer_reviews.text: I love it the bottle is just as beautiful as pictured online and it works as stated. The only issue is the bottle itself has gotten cloudy white film and nothing I use has made a difference. I lost the white rubber piece that goes inside the portion of the cap that flips and it now leaks. But has nothing to do with the bottles manufacturing. I would purchase again as well as gift to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: N. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Product worked great for infusion of fruit with water. Unfortunately it did leak a small bit. Love the bottle color and size.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend approved!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves this! She looked at a few brands but found this one and she really enjoys the infuser part is on the bottom. Product seems pretty durable as well! Only one problem, it is advertised to come with a free recipe book and we never received one.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: COUSTUMER BE WARE...DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY! NOT GOOD QUALITY!!!! It was nice at the beginning, but in just a month of use the handle to open the bottle broke. No a good quality for the price! Don't waste your money! EXPENSIVE AND MODE OF PLASTIC. HAD TO TROW IT OUT!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The lock to keep it shut broke after a week. The lid wont stay on now. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product keeps all my drinks cold or hot. I love using it for work definitely a great investment. And you even get a recipe book.
customer_reviews.author: noemi nunez

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaks so bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bottle for awhile now. I put it in the back of my cabinet because it leaks SO bad. I decided to pull it out today & it still leaks. Water leaks all over my shirt & pants. SO disappointed because this bottle is so perfect for “pretty water.”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is its not bigger. I drink close to a gallon of water a day this only holds one bottle of water. Which is practical. SO THERE IS NO COMPLAINT. ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Joi Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Functional and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Just received my water infuser bottle. I love it...all the parts are removable, for easy cleaning, and the color is soft and pretty. The strap makes it easier to carry when I take my walks, and I love being able to put fresh fruit into the tube inside. It's actually larger than it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Ok so I'm super obsessed with Rose Pink everything so definitely the color ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I'm super obsessed with Rose Pink everything so definitely the color caught my eye when purchasing (was a huge from a co-worker but she had me pick it). Received super quick. Love how I can put a lot of fruit but still have a lot of space for water. One of the best water bottles I've purchased in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great water bottle except by day 3 it started to leak. Leaking water colored by blueberries or strawberries is not good. I tried to see if it was an error on my part but it’s not. Poor design
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Broke After a Few Months
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle was lovely (rose gold) and a great idea. Love the insulator. However, after only a few months of using the bottle on a daily basis, the lock broke. I had to improvise and use a clip to help keep the top down. Soon after leaking occurred from the bottom; not sure why but had to toss it. This item needs some improving.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Peters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and functional. A must have for my desk, keeps my water tasting great , I use lemons or strawberries and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: 2nd times the charm
customer_reviews.text: The first Infuser I received would not stop leaking no matter what I did. I reached out to the sellers customer service and I was immediately sent a replacement. Second time around and Infuser works as expected. I’m so happy with my purchase now. Kudos to the Awesome Customer service by Dan.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like picture!! Gr8 quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture and as described! Im very pleased with my new tumbler!! Ima buy another in green :)
customer_reviews.author: ANI

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere after only 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so bad and I thought this would be different because it's so expensive, but unfortunately it leaks both from the bottom AND the top. I have tried every configuration of the rubber bands this comes with to try to stop the leaking, but to no avail. I hate that I can't just throw this in my purse for fear it will leak everywhere. Very cute, but just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Raz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful water bottle for aesthetics, but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product. When I did get it, it came in a nice box beautifully packaged. It was great that the seller emailed some recipes. I get a lot of compliments and questions about it. I don’t have any leakage problems. However, my one complaint is that less than a month of use and the lock that holds the lid shut broke. I was using it daily while I’m at work. I still use it and have resorted to using a rubber band to help keep the lid shut when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Is beautiful and it works
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is beautiful and it works well. I put mint leaves and cucumbers and the water taste so yummy. Is easy to clean and to assemble back.
customer_reviews.author: Dayami

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the "rose gold" and the purple. The rose gold is more of a peach besides the top strip.. But other than color i love these and the package and the compliments i get on them! all around great!
customer_reviews.author: victoria c.

customer_reviews.title: Good shape but not easy to drink from the bottle..
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the color and shape at first. But after I started to use it, I noticed that it’s not easy to drink from the bottle. It’s not so ergonomic for drink water easily..
customer_reviews.author: Barbaros

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle so much. I saw it and it was really cute and I love the rose gold looking color a lot. I ordered one for myself and then my mother saw it and knew she had to get one for herself as well. I love the fact that you can screw out the infuser and use it as a plain bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna I.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mom and myself... they're awesome! The sleeve is nice and the rose gold is so cute. It doesn't keep my water cold for very long, but I didn't really expect it as it's not insulated.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: It rusts
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with the 2 bottles in general until I've noticed the rust. I use the bottles for work as I in aviation and i always have to bring my own water to work so I was very disappointed when I've seen that both of the bottles started rusting.
customer_reviews.author: jasmina

customer_reviews.title: Helpful customer service
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the design. It looks great and for the price it works great! The customer service is excellent as well! I unfortunately had it break by a student of mine and reached out to customer service because I couldn't find a replacement for the broken piece. They took my feedback and replaced the part. 4 stars because of the initial break.
customer_reviews.author: Chantilee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the infuser attaches to the bottom. It really does help to keep the flavoring infused all the way through the water. I love the bottle and it comes cutely packaged. I do feel like it’s overkill on the packaging. I love the bottle tho. The color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got this bottle because I wanted an infuser component. I was tired of drinking plain water. I like that it comes with 2 infusers. The one that screws into the bottom is good if you like herbs in your water that way it’s contained and won’t block you from drinking. But if I’m just doing some lemon slices then I take that one out and the second closest to the top world great!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: BEST INFUSER BOTTLE ON THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: I always have a water bottle with me and this is my favorite. It's light and I don't have to worry about spilling water if I tip it over. I also like the covering that fits over the bottle to protect it so that it doesn't crack if it's accidentally dropped. The bottle holds a good amount of fruit or whatever you like to add to your water. This product is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: gcs1103

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the designed and color. Purchased for myself an co-worked admired it so much, well, now I have to buy another one. The cap design is amazing. One flick and the top pops open. Very attractive bottle. Always needed to drink more water, and with the Mami Wata on my desk, I get my daily water intake. Highly recommended. And thanks for the recipes. Try the cucumber lemon & mint! Thanks Mami Wata.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee my bottle ! I’ve gotten so many compliments and questions on where I got it from . Its so pretty , very durable , and easy to use . It came with a sleeve to keep liquids cool , a couple drink recipes came in the box and it arrived sooner than expected ! Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Keena Walker

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I love having the ability to add fruit for an infusion of flavor in my water. I get bored w/ "plain" water. Also, the bottle is a convenient size, so it fits in my gym tote and in my car's cup holder. Also, i had a problem w/ the lid on mine (nothing on Mami Wata's end) and the customer service team responded so quickly (within an hour on a SATURDAY) and resolved the issue. I will definitely be ordering another one for my husband and our grandmother shortly!
customer_reviews.author: Heathalynn

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 2 or 3 weeks ago. I read the reviews and knew it might leak but took my chances anyway. At first I thought it was leaking because maybe I wasn't closing it correctly but its definitely a problem with the bottle. Very disappointing because aside from that, i actually REALLY liked it. Its very cute and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and how well it is constructed. I will be ordering others for my daughter and niece.
customer_reviews.author: Iscah Willis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t have made it better. I love that the diffuser is at the bottom, usually when I put in ice it’s either too much or too little. Now I can just dump it in and have the perfect amount. I thought it would leak but it doesn’t. Super cute and the top even has a little strainer so you don’t drink the fruit but it is removable. Great color, exactly like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is beautiful! My 10yr old daughter picked rose gold and it's so pretty! She lives picking a new fruit (fresh or frozen) each day to add to her water. It's easy to clean and works great!
customer_reviews.author: G. Skillen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bottle
customer_reviews.text: Edited review: my first bottle was defective and wrote a review - the company reached out and replaced it for free with ease. The new bottle is great, looks good and functions as it should! Wish the sleeves were sold separately so I could buy more
customer_reviews.author: Mat harris

product_meta.title: MAMI WATA Fruit Infuser Water Bottle – Beautiful Gift Box – Unique Stylish Design - Free Fruit Infused Water Recipes eBook and Insulating Sleeve – 24oz
feature_bullets: ✅ THE PERFECT CHRISTMAS GIFT – With a beautiful tube-shaped gift box that just screams “luxury”, the MAMI WATA fruit infuser bottle is the perfect gift for that special person in your life. watch as your loved-one’s face lights up with delight when unboxing this deluxe fruit infuser bottle.

✅ TASTE THE DIFFERENCE – While tap water can be tasteless and boring, MAMI WATA provides a solution in the form of a fruit infusion water bottle that allows you to experience deliciously-fresh fruit-infused drinks.

✅ PREMIUM QUALITY & DESIGN – The MAMI WATA fruit infused water bottle is made of Eastman Tritan plastic, durable, shatterproof, BPA free and eco-friendly. It has a bottom infusing mechanism ensuring your infusion water will taste better and longer. Don't feel like making infused water? No problem. Just screw off the infuser and you will have a beautiful water bottle.
✅ 100% LEAK-PROOF – This specifically designed water bottle has a smart flip-top open/close mechanism, secured by a clever locking system. The result? A leakproof bottle that you can rely on!
✅ OUR PROMISE TO YOU – If for any reason you’re not satisfied, simply contact us for a no hassle refund.
